xs.description: Extra small track width (28px). Use for: compact settings lists, inline toggles, space-constrained UIs. Maintains approximately 1.75:1 width-to-height ratio.

sm.description: Small track width (36px). Use for: standard density settings, secondary controls. Good for desktop interfaces.

md.description: Medium track width (44px). DEFAULT size. Use for: most settings toggles, preferences panels, feature controls. Comfortable interaction size.

lg.description: Large track width (52px). Use for: touch-optimized interfaces, prominent feature toggles, accessibility-focused UIs. Better for mobile.

xl.description: Extra large track width (60px). Use for: high-emphasis standalone toggles, large touch targets, maximum accessibility. Most prominent option.

xs.description: Extra small track height (16px). Slim track for compact layouts. Thumb will be proportionally smaller.

sm.description: Small track height (20px). Standard density track height for desktop applications.

md.description: Medium track height (24px). DEFAULT. Comfortable height for most use cases. Good thumb-to-track proportion.

lg.description: Large track height (30px). Taller track for better visibility and touch targets.

xl.description: Extra large track height (36px). Maximum height for high-visibility toggles and accessibility.

borderRadius.description: Track border radius (fully rounded/pill shape). Creates the characteristic pill shape of toggle switches. Value 9999px ensures full rounding at any height.

xs.description: Extra small thumb size (12px). Circular handle for xs track. Sized to fit comfortably within track with offset padding.

sm.description: Small thumb size (14px). Proportional to sm track. Maintains visual balance within track.

md.description: Medium thumb size (18px). DEFAULT. Standard thumb for md track. Clear visual indicator of toggle position.

lg.description: Large thumb size (22px). Larger handle for better visibility and touch interaction.

xl.description: Extra large thumb size (28px). Maximum handle size for high-visibility, touch-optimized toggles.

borderRadius.description: Thumb border radius (fully rounded/circular). Creates perfect circle for the sliding handle. Essential for the switch visual language.

offset.description: Thumb offset from track edge (2px). Small gap between thumb and track edge creates visual breathing room and indicates interactive affordance.

gap.description: Gap between switch and label (12px). Clear separation between control and label while maintaining visual association.

fontSize.description: Label font size (14px). Standard form label size. Readable without overwhelming the switch control itself.

duration.description: Switch transition duration (100ms). Fast, snappy animation for immediate feedback feel. Sliding motion should feel responsive.

easing.description: Switch transition easing (ease-out). Thumb decelerates into final position for natural, satisfying toggle motion.

ringWidth.description: Focus ring width (2px). Clearly visible ring around switch when focused via keyboard navigation.

ringOffset.description: Focus ring offset (2px). Space between switch track and focus ring for clear visual separation.
